name: apache-answer
tagline: A question and answer platform for knowledge sharing within teams and communities
description: Answer is a self-hosted Q&A platform where users ask and answer questions, similar to StackOverflow. It includes tags, markdown, voting, and moderation features, designed for teams or communities who want full data control.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted knowledge sharing similar to StackOverflow. Build your community

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Organize questions with tags for easy discovery and filtering. Find answers fast

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Rich text formatting for questions and answers. Express ideas clearly

features.title: Full Data Control
features.description: All community knowledge stored on your own infrastructure. Complete ownership

features.title: User Reputation
features.description: Gamification encourages quality contributions and participation. Engaged community
